bilingual.source: The new sports car has a sexy design.
bilingual.target: 这款新跑车有一个性感的设计。

bilingual.source: She wore a sexy red dress to the party.
bilingual.target: 她穿了一条性感的红色连衣裙去参加聚会。

bilingual.source: She danced in a sexy way that mesmerized the audience.
bilingual.target: 她以一种性感的方式跳舞，迷住了观众。
米利班德是个性感的小婊砸。

bilingual.source: He asked if I thought of him when I was posing sexy on set.
bilingual.target: 还问我在台上摆出性感的造型的时候有没有想他。

bilingual.source: The key to looking sexy in a strapless frock? A flawless fit.
bilingual.target: 穿无肩带连衣裙看上去性感的关键？那就是非常合身。

bilingual.source: The things that make the bad boys sexy do not make them good husbands.
bilingual.target: 坏男人性感的因素不会让他们成为好丈夫。

bilingual.source: Ah yes, Dr. Cullen. Peter Facinelli is one sexy vampire, on- and off-screen.
bilingual.target: 哦！库伦医生（彼得费新利）一直都是个性感的吸血鬼，不管是不是在大荧幕上。

bilingual.source: Why? Because often, what makes a person single is exactly what makes a person sexy.
bilingual.target: 为什么呢？因为通常来说，一个人单身的原因同时也是令其自身性感的所在。

bilingual.source: The Halo singer is a real trailblazer and was well ahead of the game with her sexy shot.
bilingual.target: 这位光环备至的歌手是真正的瑜伽自拍先驱，她性感的照片让她远走在此次游戏的前列。

yingyinNormal.en: If this is your idea of sexy talk?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你觉得这是性感的谈话…

yingyinNormal.en: Something sexy that doesn't show my tits, arms or belly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要性感的，不能激凸，不能暴露胳膊及腹部赘肉。

yingyinNormal.en: He's thin and sexy like a Jewish greyhound. Yeah, that is the sexiest dog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我家华仔可是一条苗条性感的犹太小灰狗。是是是，那还真是最性感的一种狗呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm not confused at all. You're like a sexy toddler. I don't know how to process that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一点都没搞错，你简直像个性感的婴儿。我不知道该怎么接话了。

yingyinNormal.en: And now, I'm gonna pass the news onto Joey and Chandler. That you're not funny or sexy? That's right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在就去告诉乔伊和钱德。说你不风趣也不性感的消息吗？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you can hide behind a sexy smile or a walking cane, or just be a therapist, talking about you all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个性感的微笑或拐杖就能让你隐藏起来，或是做个治疗师，一直聊你的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Sometimes Howard and I pretend that his arrhythmia is acting up and I'm a sexy cardiologist. And the naughty part is I'm not in his HMO network.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有时候霍华德和我会假装他出现了心律失常，而我是一个性感的心脏病医生。最好玩的部分是，我的护理服务可是不收费的哟。

yingyinNormal.en: See? Huh? So sexy. Honey? Yeah?
yingyinNormal.zh: 瞧？怎样？真性感。亲爱的？什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, sickly is the new sexy. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吸血鬼式的病态肤色的确是新性感指标，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Burke is sexy? Oh, God! Absolutely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 柏克大夫性感？天啊，绝对是。

yingyinNormal.en: Go nuts. Oh. I will. So, what are you wearing to the party? Sexy cat? Sexy nurse? Sexy zombie?
yingyinNormal.zh: 疯狂开吃吧。我会的。所以你要打扮成什么来参加派对？性感小野猫？性感护士？性感丧尸？

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, no, no I don't think it's weird, I think, I think in fact, in fact you know what I think? What? I think it's sexy. Sexy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不认为很怪，我想，你知道我怎么想吗？怎么想？我觉得这很性感。性感？

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, we both know he has a soft spot for the sexy doctor type.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都知道他就喜欢性感医生。

yingyinNormal.en: Beautiful, tall, sexy, showing her stomach? Look at all the boxes!
yingyinNormal.zh: 美丽、高挑、性感、露肚脐？你看这堆箱子。

yingyinNormal.en: It was so amazing, he is so sexy, and smart, which makes him even sexier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简直不可思议，他性感又聪明，这让他显得更性感。

yingyinNormal.en: What is it? Am I giving out some kind of sexy professor vibe? Not right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是怎么一回事？我散发出性感教授的气质吗？现在看起来不像。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it's you. Please. No, really. Come on. You' re smart. You're sexy. Right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是你啊，不要这么说。不，我是说真的，你既聪明又性感。真的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you should have seen him... denying things left and right. It was so sexy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真该看看他的样子——这个不行那个不准。实在太性感了。

yingyinNormal.en: Keeping secrets from our friends, that does sound kinda fun. Does it sound sexy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我们朋友有秘密，听起来的确挺有意思。听起来...性感咩？

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone's all, "Ross you have to be funny and sexy." Well, I proved them wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个人都说 “你得表现得风趣又性感”，我证明他们错了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 性的；性欲的；性关系的；两性的；配子融合的；性别的；有性繁殖的；性特征的

word_family.mean: n. 性行为；性交；性；性别；女人；生殖器；男（或雄）性；女（或雌）性；男人

examination_example.sentence: A tanned complexion is considered much more beautiful and <highlight>sexy</highlight> in the West.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在西方，黝黑的肤色被认为更漂亮、更性感。

examination_example.sentence: When looking at how women are depicted, the study found female characters were four times more likely to be shown in <highlight>sexy</highlight> clothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当研究女性形象时，研究发现女性角色穿着性感服装的可能性是现实中的四倍。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。
